metadata.name: Certified Dreams
metadata.description:
Certified Dreams....

My genesis music NFT.... 

Building something of value requires concentration.... It requires focus....  The heartache can be agonizing....  The discouragement can be immobilizing....  The distractions can be overwhelming.... The anxiety can be crippling....  You can be led astray....

But to persevere, even by stumbling upwards, takes you in the direction of the heavens.... 

Certified Dreams is the representation of the journey that starts with the grind, so that through the grind you can build your treasure, but to never forget that the entirety of the journey is the treasure itself.... 

The song cover is a picture of myself as a child playing the violin....  I never liked playing the violin and never practiced enough to become good....  I wish I had....  But now I make music....  Would I be making music today if I had kept playing ?  Maybe....  Maybe not....  But here I am, minting a music NFT....  I guess it’s all part of the journey.... And I trust that I’m at least stumbling upwards....

Produced/Mixed/Mastered by M-Wavy....  
Artwork by M-Wavy....
